name: serverless-hexagonal-template
description: Highly opinionated project template for Serverless Framework that follows and applies hexagonal architecture principle to serverless world. Prepared with easy testing in mind.
author: Pawel Zubkiewicz

scripts.test: npm run build && node --experimental-vm-modules node_modules/jest/bin/jest.js --config config/unit.jest.config.js
scripts.integration: npm run export-env-local && node --experimental-vm-modules node_modules/jest/bin/jest.js --config config/integration.jest.config.mjs
scripts.all: npm run test && npm run integration && npm run e2e
scripts.all-dev: npm run test && npm run export-env-dev && npm run int && npm run e2e
